import React, { useState } from "react"; const Form = () => { const [size, setSize] = useState(""); const [milk, setMilk] = useState(""); const [sweet, setSweet] = useState(""); const updateSize = (e) => { setSize(e.target.value); }; const updateMilk = (e) => { setMilk(e.target.value); }; const updateSweet = (e) => { setSweet(e.target.value); }; const handleSubmit = (e) => { e.preventDefault(); }; return (
size
{price * 0.8}
milk
Sweetner
); }; export default Form;
